presentation: About 9 years of experience in software development and computer programming for different business contexts such as finance, audit, education, and advertising, usually open to new opportunities and looking to join a dynamic and innovative team to use my expertise in designing and developing software solutions to help the company to achieve its goals.

about.summary: A high qualified full stack engineer with a wide breadth of experience with various programming languages to develop high-quality software solutions, able to quickly grasp complex systems and identify opportunities for improvements and resolution of critical issues, also skilled in software methodologies development, enlisting the support of all team members in aligning with timeline and goals project.

subskills: Event, REST and SOAP Web Services

Google app engine, Apigee, Build, Strorage, Vpc network, Run

work_experiences.description: Working as a contractor, responsible for translating client demand to job seeker system features.
accomplishments: Deliver sprint tasks for job seeker analytic app.
Support and resolve system bugs for a search resume app.
Provide reusable services/components for backend/frontend apps for shared use.

work_experiences.description: Leading an IT team with the goal to manage and migrate an intern advertising distribution central system, responsible for setting up standars and procedures of development, also involved in another team as system architect with the goal to create a b2b bonus advertising system.
accomplishments: Designing user interface (UI) layouts for software applications.
Define aspects of development from appropriate technology and workflow to coding standards
Design and implement CI/CD pipeline templates for different nature projects for smooth delivery and better quality results.
Provide reusable services/components (front-end components lib, export service, notification service, frontend project starter, backend project starter).

work_experiences.description: As a team member, I was responsible to deliver client features for a digital education result platform(logistics and devolution context)
accomplishments: Developing technical product specifications with attention to system integration and feasibility
Weekly iteration in the development cycle regarding the customer needs.

work_experiences.description: Working as an intern software engineer responsible for delivering digital bank features(prepaid card issuance, money transfer, bill payment).
accomplishments: Design and implementation of exadata services for credit and debit card operators.
Definition and implementation of the standards of the micro front-end approach.
Creation of development tools and implementation of best programming practices.

work_experiences.description: Resolve client bugs and issues, Design and implementation of client required needs for an audit/banking system, building mobile apps for audit/banking use.
accomplishments: Support and resolve system and client’s issues for an Audit platform programmed in JAVA 6, spring 3 and JSF 1.2 using multi database providers.

Design and implementation of hybrid mobile apps for banking use, users can hire bank services as current account, credit card... , This app has many features such as send notification, SMS, Geolocation, Facial and Document recognition.
Design and implementation of hybrid mobile app with Ionic framework consuming Rest web services implemented with Jersey restful, framework from the server side and Restangular from the client side.
Support and migration of JSF 1.2 project from Jboss 5 to Jboss as 7

Design and implementation of management and digitalization documents platform for banking use developed with AngularJS 1.5, Angular Material from the client side and Spring 3 and jersey API from the server side.

accomplishments: Cutomise an already Django App to reply to journalism concept,in the look and the behaviour
Building a shared environment for students to share their work and to be able to exchange knowledge’s and ideas between all the students.
Design and implementation for web client app.
